name: Stroll of the Dice
description:
Take control of a die as you roll it along platforms, jumping up to ledges you can’t roll onto. But that’s strange—you can’t seem to jump high enough to reach that next ledge. Maybe there’s some way to jump higher...?

Hope you enjoy this puzzle game we made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam! Don’t worry about getting too stuck; there are multiple solutions to each puzzle.

Keyboard and Controller Supported. (Though something wrong with itch.io or the WebGL build has been making the control stick not work properly; if this happens to you, you can use the D-Pad instead!)

Designed by Devin and Dustin. Art by Maddy. Music by Devin. Plus two cents from friends!
